name: Containment (itch) (Natasha)
description:
CONTENT WARNING: Contains lots of bright flashing lights, play at own risk. There is a photosensitive mode which reduces the intensity of the lights and removes the post processing, but I cannot vouch for its effectiveness.

Bullet hell escape game for Bullet Hell Jam 2022!

Play as a humble jellyfish trapped in a secret government facility, and try to escape as the odds stack increasingly against you.  This is a simple game where you just have to dodge increasingly many bullets and collect as many collectibles as you can in a very cramped area. Try and escape as fast as you can while keeping an eye on your health!

Assets used:

- BulletFury free trial offered during the Bullet Hell Jam 2022 by WayfarerGames

- SynthWave Music Pack by TRWorkshop on the Unity Asset Store
